mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO NAV_JNL( BILL_ID, BILL_NO, AGE, BILL_NAME, CURR_COMMITTEE_ID, CURR_COMMITTEE, PROC_DT, COMMITTEE_RESULT, LINK_URL, COMMITTEE_PROC_DT, CMT_PRESENT_DT, LAW_SUBMIT_DT, LAW_PRESENT_DT, LAW_PROC_DT, LAW_PROC_RESULT_CD, COMMITTEE_DT) VALUES( #{billId}, #{billNo}, #{age}, #{billName}, #{currCommitteeId}, #{currCommittee},
TO_DATE(#{procDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
NULL
, #{committeeResult}, #{linkUrl},
TO_DATE(#{committeeProcDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
NULL
,
TO_DATE(#{cmtPresentDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
NULL
,
TO_DATE(#{lawSubmitDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
NULL
,
TO_DATE(#{lawPresentDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
NULL
,
TO_DATE(#{lawProcDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
NULL
, #{lawProcResultCd},
TO_DATE(#{committeeDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
NULL
)

INSERT INTO NCOCPGFIAOITUANBR( BILL_ID, PROC_DT, BILL_NO, BILL_NAME, CURR_COMMITTEE, CURR_COMMITTEE_ID, PROC_RESULT_CD, BILL_KIND_CD, AGE, MEMBER_TCNT, VOTE_TCNT, YES_TCNT, NO_TCNT, BLANK_TCNT, LINK_URL ) VALUES( #{billId},
TO_DATE(#{procDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
NULL
, #{billNo}, #{billName}, #{currCommittee}, #{currCommitteeId}, #{procResultCd}, #{billKindCd}, #{age}, #{memberTcnt}, #{voteTcnt}, #{yesTcnt}, #{noTcnt}, #{blankTcnt}, #{linkUrl} )

INSERT INTO WEBCASTVCONF( ERACO, CONF_DT, CONF_PTM, CONF_NM, LINK_URL ) VALUES( #{eraco},
TO_DATE(#{confDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
NULL
, #{confPtm}, #{confNm}, #{linkUrl} )
